summary: This document outlines the terms of The Haze Trust, created by Jeffrey E. Epstein, who serves as both Grantor and Trustee. It details the powers and responsibilities of the Trustee, including the management and distribution of trust assets, and the appointment of successor trustees.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Grantor and Trustee of The Haze Trust, responsible for managing the trust's assets and making discretionary decisions regarding distributions.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is designated as a successor Trustee of The Haze Trust, accepting the role and agreeing to the terms of the Trust Agreement.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein, as Grantor and Trustee, designates Darren K. Indyke to act as a Trustee of The Haze Trust.

events.title: Creation of The Haze Trust
events.description: The Haze Trust is established by Jeffrey E. Epstein, outlining the powers of the Trustee and the management of trust assets.

events.title: Appointment of Successor Trustee
events.description: Darren K. Indyke accepts his appointment as Trustee of The Haze Trust, agreeing to the terms of the Trust Agreement.

keyFacts: The Haze Trust was created by Jeffrey E. Epstein on February 9, 1999.
Jeffrey E. Epstein serves as both Grantor and Trustee of the Trust.
Darren K. Indyke is designated as a successor Trustee of The Haze Trust.
The Trustee has broad discretionary powers regarding the management and distribution of trust assets.
The Trust Agreement allows for the revocation or amendment by the Grantor during his lifetime.
